p: Large surface area is also a crucial characteristic regarding to cargo diffusion process from MSNs. Vallet-Regí group ( 82– 84) reported the 2-D hexagonal mesoporous silica as carriers showing higher drugs adsorption values for MCM-41 (Specific surface area (S BET) = 1157 m 2 g −1) than for SBA-15 (S BET = 719 m 2 g −1) systems.
